snippet: The sale will offer 164,750 acres of federal waters off Rhode Island and Massachusetts, an area that could produce enough energy to power more than one million homes.
abstract: Interior Department reports that federal government will hold first lease sale for commercial offshore wind energy projects; sales will offer 164,750 acres of federal waters off Rhode Island and Massachusetts; area could produce enough energy to power more than one million homes.
lead_paragraph: The sale will offer 164,750 acres of federal waters off Rhode Island and Massachusetts, an area that could produce enough energy to power more than one million homes.

headline.seo: U.S. to Hold Sale for Offshore Wind Energy Leases
headline.main: U.S. to Lease Federal Waters for Commercial Offshore Wind Energy
headline.print_headline: U.S. to Lease Federal Waters for Commercial Offshore Wind Energy
